body:
#### PR description:
This PR include two change to migrate to esConsumes:
1) New GeometryMTProducer providing geometry for Geant4e backward propagator.
2) New design of SimWatchers allowing SimWatchers to work in the MT mode.

No change in baseline simulation is expected. If this PR will be merged then all Watchers and Producers may be migrated to the new design. GeometryProducer sub-library will be removed.
